roadmap.title: Presale / Whitelist
roadmap.description:
For the first 500 users, allowing up to 3 sales per wallet and sale price at 0.75 SOL.

100 free airdrops to Discord, Twitter and other social medium for completing 'competitions' like the invite 'competition'.

roadmap.title: Remaining ~8875-9500 Mint @1.0 SOL
roadmap.description: Total number varies based on the amount of 'early sales' and airdrops.

roadmap.title: Once sold out
roadmap.description:
NFT Marketplace release that will likely become the first cross-chain marketplace.

Letâ€™s buyback the floor of 100-150 SOL and then Airdrop to friends and family, possibly do it over 3 days and do 50 SOL each day.

faq.question: Wen mint?
faq.answer: Public sale starts at 12th of December, at 11am PST

faq.question: How many NFTs are available?
faq.answer: A total of 10,000 items will be available. Around 200 of these will be used for competitions and Airdrops, with the remainder of NFTs all being used for the public mint.

faq.question: How much for each NFT?
faq.answer: 1.00 SOL for the Public Sale and 0.75 SOL for Whitelist Sale.

faq.question: Where can I buy or sell my ratz?
faq.answer: Our primary marketplace will be our own custom designed and developed marketplace, NakedNFTs. We are thinking about secondary marketplaces currently and would hope to list on Magic Eden.

faq.question: Will I be considered cool if I buy a hoodrat?
